name: json-shaper
description: Shape a flat array into a molded json shape with deep nesting
author: Chris Kalmar <christian.kalmar@gmail.com>

scripts.test: npm run lint && mocha --compilers js:babel-register -R spec --check-leaks lib/*.js
scripts.build: mkdir dist; npm run test && babel lib/json-shaper.js -o dist/index.js
scripts.coverage-codecov: NODE_ENV=test nyc npm run test && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | codecov
